entry.title: Putin Orders Draft of Reservists for War in Ukraine
entry.content: The Russian president raised the threat of a nuclear response in the Ukraine conflict and ordered reservists to mobilize, as Moscow seeks to buttress its army’s flagging manpower and regain the offensive.

entry.title: Putin's Risky Escalation Might Not Reverse Russia's Battlefield Setbacks in Ukraine
entry.content: Putin’s decision to draft reservists for his invasion show how badly the war has gone for Russia so far, military and political analysts say.

entry.title: Young Palestinians Battle Israeli Troops and the Palestinian Authority, Deepening Unrest
entry.content: The Palestinian Authority is losing its grip over the northern West Bank, opening up a potential leadership vacuum.

entry.title: Chinese Port Lease Near U.S. Troops' Australian Training Ground Draws Fresh Scrutiny
entry.content: With U.S.-China competition intensifying in the Indo-Pacific, a Chinese company’s lease on an Australian port—which some former defense officials call a foothold in a strategically important area—is under renewed scrutiny.
